Name: Dike
Desc:
Rapidly spins the Ether Swords around you to block enemy attacks and attack at the same time. This skill isn't affected by cooldown reset effects.
Become immune to critical abnormal status while casting Dike, negating the damage if attacked right after casting and reducing the damage from attack even more afterwards. May be used while using TriggerÂ skillsexcept for Tread.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 150. Skill can be held down for up to 8 sec. During key-down, damage taken -40% including attacks that inflict damage based on Max HP.
If you are attacked immediately upon using the skill, damage from the attack is negated and the damage reduction increases to 55% for the duration of holding the key down afterwards.
When the skill ends, Cooldown 3.5 sec. for each second left on the key-down time.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
